name: gitty
description: ðŸ˜¸ Backup all your git repos with a single command!

scripts.build: rm -rf gitty* && esbuild index.js --bundle --outfile=build.cjs --format=cjs --platform=node && pkg -t node16-linux,node16-win,node16-macos-x64,node16-macos-arm64 build.cjs -C GZip -o gitty && rm -rf build.cjs index test test.cjs

author: Explosion-Scratch
